price: Ɔno na ͻsoro ne asaase so ayeyie wͻ no wͻ εberε a onwunu bεdwoͻ ne εberε a owia bɛgyina.
arabic: وَلَهُ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَعَشِيّٗا وَحِينَ تُظۡهِرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walahu al-ḥamdu fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi waʿashiyyan waḥīna tuẓ'hirūna
